data.title: BLACK HISTORY (2005) – Jamie Foxx and the Best Speech of the Night
data.meta_description: He was the favorite in 2005 to win Best Actor in a Motion Picture Musical or Comedy for his portrayal of Ray Charles in Taylor Hackford’s Ray and gave the funniest and liveliest acceptance speech of the night until dedicating his Golden Globe to his grandma Estelle. That moment brought tears.
